Eh I just feel, Crummy, all of a sudden. 

Damn you Mood swings. Maybe its my conscious eating away at me again. 

Sometimes I feel My constant playfully bashing people for no reason gets on peoples nerves. 

Either that or something deep in me makes me feel like being a dick sometimes. Maybe its stress.

topics.body:
Well its mostly sometimes I think my playfuly being a dick turns into actually being a Dick.

Again its a consciousness thing. I feel disappointed at myself I guess.

All I do is just sit in a room all day while everyone here has something they are doing and accomplishing. All I do is sit around and say dumb crap to people and than I sleep. Getting fat off of junk food.

It aggravates me how lazy I am.

Yeah I understand, I need to start getting back on my school stuff and getting back to losing weight and getting some muscle. 

My motivation to do things has been really low lately and it feels like its getting worse. 

Also I think your right, I have literally lately been looking at porn and literally having the most blank arousal ever.

Basically this is me when I look at porn now a days.
